mismatches.description: Invoice amount is $2489.79, which exceeds the maximum potential amount according to the contract for basic services.
mismatches.contract_ref: Contract specifies weekly curbside collection and other services not exceeding defined billing.

mismatches.description: There are items in the invoice (Finance Charge, Fuel Surcharge) that are not listed in the contract terms.
mismatches.invoice_ref: Invoice items include Finance Charge and Fuel Surcharge
mismatches.contract_ref: Contract does not specify these charges.

mismatches.description: Service dates in the invoice (06/01/25) do not align with contract effective date (2025-01-01).

result.summary: The invoice shows total charges of $2,489.79 including prior balance, finance charges, and additional surcharges. The contract specifies only basic waste collection services without indication for finance charges or fuel surcharges. Multiple mismatches identified regarding overbilling, missing items, and date discrepancies.
